00074 /* FUNCTION  sigchld_handler():                                                 */
00075 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00076 
00077 void sigchld_handler(int s) {
00078     while(wait(NULL) > 0);
00079 }

00083 /* FUNCTION  setup():                                                           */
00084 /* It creates two threads by calling tcp() and udp() in each thread.            */
00085 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

00087 void setup(){
00088 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00089 /*        Initialize Global Mutex Variables from global.h           */
00090 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00091 
00092         int err;
00093 
00094         /* Create UDP socket and bind to port */
00095 
00096         if ((UL_UDP_sockfd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) == -1) {
00097 
00098                  perror("socket");
00099                  exit(1);
00100 
00101         } else {
00102 
00103                 printf("UDP Socket:Sucessfully created\n");
00104         
00105         }       
00106 
00107         if (setsockopt(UL_UDP_sockfd,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&yes,sizeof(int)) == -1) {
00108                 perror("setsockopt");
00109                 exit(1);
00110         }
00111 
00112         UDP_my_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;            // host byte order
00113         UDP_my_addr.sin_port = htons(UDPPORT);       // short, network byte order
00114         UDP_my_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;    // automatically fill with my IP
00115         memset(&(UDP_my_addr.sin_zero),'\0', 8);     // zero the rest of the struct
00116 
00117         if (bind(UL_UDP_sockfd, (struct sockaddr *)&UDP_my_addr,
00118                                             sizeof(struct sockaddr)) == -1) {
00119                 perror("bind");
00120                 exit(1);
00121         } else {
00122 
00123                 printf("UDP Socket Bind :Sucessfull\n");
00124         } 
00125 
00126 
00127         /* Created socket and bound to port */
00128 
00129         /* Create TCP socket and bind and listen on port */
00130 
00131         if ((UL_TCP_sockfd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == -1) {
00132                 perror("socket");
00133                 exit(1);
00134         } else {
00135 
00136                 printf("TCP Socket:Sucessfully created\n");
00137         }
00138  
00139         if (setsockopt(UL_TCP_sockfd,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&yes,sizeof(int)) == -1) {
00140                 perror("setsockopt");
00141                 exit(1);
00142         }
00143 
00144         TCP_my_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;          // host byte order
00145         TCP_my_addr.sin_port = htons(TCPPORT);     // short, network byte order
00146         TCP_my_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;  // automatically fill with my IP
00147         memset(&(TCP_my_addr.sin_zero), '\0', 8);  // zero the rest of the struct
00148 
00149         if (bind(UL_TCP_sockfd, (struct sockaddr *)&TCP_my_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr))
00150                                                                    == -1) {
00151                 perror("bind");
00152                 exit(1);
00153 
00154         } else {
00155 
00156                 printf("TCP Socket Bind :Sucessfull\n");
00157         }
00158 
00159         if (listen(UL_TCP_sockfd, BACKLOG) == -1) {
00160 
00161                 perror("listen");
00162                 exit(1);
00163 
00164         } else {
00165 
00166                 printf("TCP Listen :Sucessfull\n");
00167         }
00168 
00169         sa.sa_handler = sigchld_handler; // reap all dead processes
00170         sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00171         sa.sa_flags = SA_RESTART;
00172         if (sigaction(SIGCHLD, &sa, NULL) == -1) {
00173                 perror("sigaction");
00174                 exit(1);
00175         }
00176 
00177         /* TCP created socket and is litening for connections */
00178 
00179         printf("\nUDP Listening on port %d for command frames from Upper PDC\n",UDPPORT);
00180         printf("\nTCP Listening on port %d for command frames from Upper PDC\n",TCPPORT);
00181         printf("\nPort %d for Sending data for archival from Upper PDC\n",DBPORT);
00182 
00183         UL_TCP_sin_size = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00184         UL_UDP_addr_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr);
00185         DB_addr_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr);
00186 
00187         /* Threads are created for UDP and TCP to listen on port 6001 and 6000 respectively in default attr mode*/
00188         if((err = pthread_create(&UDP_thread,NULL,UL_udp,NULL))) { 
00189 
00190                 perror(strerror(err));
00191                 exit(1);        
00192         }
00193 
00194         if((err = pthread_create(&TCP_thread,NULL,UL_tcp,NULL))) {
00195 
00196                 perror(strerror(err));
00197                 exit(1);        
00198         }
00199

00201 
00202                 perror(strerror(err));

00211 /* FUNCTION  UL_udp():                                                          */
00212 /* Handles upper layer PDC command frames                                       */
00213 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00214 
00215 void* UL_udp(){
00216 
00217         /* UDP data Received */
00218         while(1) {
00219                 
00220                memset(UL_udp_command,'\0',19);
00221                memset(display_buf,'\0',200);
00222 
00223                if ((numbytes = recvfrom(UL_UDP_sockfd,UL_udp_command, 18, 0,(struct sockaddr *)&UL_UDP_addr, (socklen_t *)&UL_UDP_addr_len)) == -1) { 
00224                                                                                                                         // Main if
00225                          perror("recvfrom");
00226                          exit(1);
00227 
00228                 } else { /* New datagram has been received */
00229 
00230                         int pdc_flag = 0;
00231                         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);
00232                         struct Upper_Layer_Details *temp_pdc = ULfirst;                         
00233                         if(ULfirst == NULL) {
00234         
00235                                 pdc_flag = 0;                           
00236         
00237                         } else  {
00238                 
00239                                 while(temp_pdc != NULL ) {
00240 
00241                                         if((!strcmp(temp_pdc->ip,inet_ntoa(UL_UDP_addr.sin_addr))) && 
00242                                                 (!strncasecmp(temp_pdc->protocol,"UDP",3)) && (temp_pdc->port == UDPPORT)) {
00243                                                                 
00244                                                 pdc_flag = 1;           
00245                                                 break;
00246                                         } else {
00247                                                 
00248                                                 temp_pdc = temp_pdc->next;
00249                                         }                                                                       
00250                                 }                                                                                               
00251                         }
00252         
00253                         if(pdc_flag){ 
00254 
00255                                 unsigned char c = UL_udp_command[1];
00256                                 c <<= 1;
00257                                 c >>= 5;        
00258                                 temp_pdc->sockfd = UL_UDP_sockfd;
00259 
00260                                 if(c  == 0x04) { /* Check if it is a command frame from Upper PDC */ 
00261                 
00262                                          fprintf(fp_log,"\nCommand frame Received\n");
00263                                          c = UL_udp_command[15];
00264                                          
00265                                          if((c & 0x05) == 0x05){ //Send CFg frame to PDC
00266                                          printf("\nCommand frame for CFG Received\n");
00267 
00268                                                 while(root_pmuid != NULL); // Wait till all the status change has been cleared
00269 
00270                                                 printf("sockfd = %d,ipaddress = %s\n",temp_pdc->sockfd,inet_ntoa(temp_pdc->pdc_addr.sin_addr));
00271                                                 validation_result ("Configuration request received");/* Show the success message to user */
00272                                                 if(temp_pdc->address_set == 0) {
00273 
00274                                                         memcpy(&temp_pdc->pdc_addr,&UL_UDP_addr,sizeof(UL_UDP_addr));
00275 
00276                                                 }
00277                                                 numbytes = create_cfgframe();
00278 
00279                                                 if ((numbytes = sendto (temp_pdc->sockfd,cfgframe, numbytes, 0,
00280                                                           (struct sockaddr *)&temp_pdc->pdc_addr,sizeof(temp_pdc->pdc_addr)) == -1)) {
00281                                                           
00282                                                       perror("sendto");
00283 
00284                                                 } else {
00285 
00286                                                         fprintf(fp_log,"Sent CFG FRAME\n");
00287                                                 }
00288                                                 free(cfgframe);
00289 
00290                                                 temp_pdc->UL_upper_pdc_cfgsent = 1;
00291                                                 temp_pdc->config_change = 0;
00292         
00293                                           } else if((c & 0x02) == 0x02) { // if data frame 
00294 
00295                                                 if(temp_pdc->UL_upper_pdc_cfgsent == 1) { // Only if cfg is sent send the data  
00296 
00297                                                         temp_pdc->UL_data_transmission_off = 0;
00298 
00299                                                 } else {
00300         
00301                                                         fprintf(fp_log,"Data cannot be sent as CMD for CFG not received\n");
00302 
00303                                                 }                       
00304                         
00305                                         } else if ((c & 0x01) == 0x01){
00306 
00307                                                 temp_pdc->UL_data_transmission_off = 1;
00308 
00309                                         }                                 
00310 
00311                                 } else { /* If it is a frame other than command frame */
00312 
00313                                         fprintf(fp_log,"Not a command frame\n");                                                
00314                                 }
00315                         
00316 
00317                         } else { /* If the command frame is not from authentic PDC*/
00318         
00319                                 fprintf(fp_log,"Command frame from un-authentic PDC\n");
00320                         }
00321 
00322                 } // Main if ends       
00323                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);
00324         } // while ends         
00325 }

00328 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00329 /* FUNCTION  UL_tcp():                                                          */
00330 /* It Handles Upper Layer PDC connections.                                      */
00331 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00332 
00333 void* UL_tcp() {
00334 
00335         int err;
00336         // A new thread is created for each TCP connection in 'detached' mode. Thus allowing any number of threads to be created. 
00337         pthread_attr_t attr;
00338         pthread_attr_init(&attr);
00339         if((err = pthread_attr_setdetachstate(&attr, PTHREAD_CREATE_DETACHED))) { // In  the detached state, the thread resources are
00340                                                                                 // immediately freed when it terminates, but 
00341                 perror(strerror(err));                                          // pthread_join(3) cannot be used to synchronize
00342                 exit(1);                                                        //  on the thread termination.         
00343                                                                                 
00344         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
00345                                                                           
00346         if((err = pthread_attr_setschedpolicy(&attr,SCHED_FIFO))) { // Shed policy = SCHED_FIFO (realtime, first-in first-out)
00347 
00348                 perror(strerror(err));               
00349                 exit(1);
00350         }  
00351 
00352         int sin_size,new_fd,pdc_flag = 0;
00353 
00354         while (1) {
00355         
00356                 sin_size = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00357                 if (((new_fd = accept(UL_TCP_sockfd, (struct sockaddr *)&UL_TCP_addr,
00358                                                                (socklen_t *)&sin_size)) == -1)) { // main if starts
00359                     perror("accept");
00360 
00361                 } else { /* New TCP connection has been received*/ 
00362                 
00363                         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);                                                 
00364                         struct Upper_Layer_Details *temp_pdc = ULfirst;
00365                         if(ULfirst == NULL) {
00366 
00367                                 pdc_flag = 0;                           
00368         
00369                         } else {
00370 
00371                                 while(temp_pdc != NULL ) {
00372 
00373                                         if((!strcmp(temp_pdc->ip,inet_ntoa(UL_TCP_addr.sin_addr))) && 
00374                                                 (!strncasecmp(temp_pdc->protocol,"TCP",3)) && (temp_pdc->port == TCPPORT)) {
00375                                                                 
00376                                                 pdc_flag = 1;           
00377                                                 break;
00378                                         } else {
00379                                                 
00380                                                 temp_pdc = temp_pdc->next;
00381                                         }                                                                       
00382                                 }                                                                                               
00383                         }
00384                         if(pdc_flag) {
00385 
00386                                 temp_pdc->sockfd = new_fd;                              
00387                                 /* PDC is authentic. Send the command frame for cfg frame */
00388                                 pthread_t t;
00389                                 fprintf(fp_log,"server: got connection from %s\n",
00390                                                            inet_ntoa(temp_pdc->pdc_addr.sin_addr));
00391                                 /* Creates a new thread for each TCP connection. */
00392                                 if((err = pthread_create(&t,&attr,UL_tcp_connection,(void *)temp_pdc))) {
00393         
00394                                         perror(strerror(err));               
00395                                         exit(1);
00396                                 }                               
00397 
00398                         } else { /* If PMU ip is not in the upperpdc_ip.txt */
00399                                 
00400                                 fprintf(fp_log,"Request from %s TCP which is un-authentic\n",
00401                                                                                 inet_ntoa(UL_TCP_addr.sin_addr));                       
00402                         }       
00403                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);                                                                       
00404 
00405                 } // main if ends       
00406                                                 
00407         } // While ends
00408 
00409         pthread_attr_destroy(&attr);
00410 }

00413 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00414 /* FUNCTION  UL_tcp_connection():                                               */
00415 /* It handles command frames from upper layer PDC on TCP        .               */
00416 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00417 
00418 void* UL_tcp_connection(void * temp_pdc) {
00419 
00420         struct Upper_Layer_Details *udetails = (struct Upper_Layer_Details *) temp_pdc;
00421         int UL_new_fd = udetails->sockfd;
00422  printf("\nframe Re\n");
00423         while(1) {
00424 
00425                   memset(UL_tcp_command,19,0);  
00426                   int bytes_read = recv(UL_new_fd,UL_tcp_command,18,0);
00427                   if(bytes_read == -1) {
00428 
00429                         perror("recvfrom");
00430                         exit(1);
00431                 
00432 /*                } else if(n == 0){
00433 
00434                         printf("The Client connected to socked %d has exited so terminating the connection\n",new_fd);
00435                         close(new_fd);
00436                         pthread_exit(NULL);
00437 */                                        
00438                   } else {
00439 
00440                         pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);                                                 
00441                         unsigned char c = UL_tcp_command[1];
00442                         c <<= 1;
00443                         c >>= 5;
00444 
00445                         if(c  == 0x04) {        /* Check if it is a command frame from Upper PDC*/                      
00446 
00447                                  fprintf(fp_log,"Command frame Received\n"); // Need to further check if the command is for cfg or data
00448                                  c = UL_tcp_command[15];
00449 
00450                                  if((c & 0x05) == 0x05){ //Send CFg frame to PDC
00451 
00452                                         while(root_pmuid != NULL); // Wait till the staus chage list becomes empty
00453                                         numbytes = create_cfgframe();
00454                                         if (send(UL_new_fd,cfgframe,numbytes, 0)== -1)
00455                                                         perror("send");                                         
00456                                         free(cfgframe);
00457 
00458                                         udetails->UL_upper_pdc_cfgsent = 1;
00459                                         udetails->config_change = 0;
00460 
00461                                         } else if((c & 0x02) == 0x02) {
00462                                 
00463                                                 if(udetails->UL_upper_pdc_cfgsent == 1) { // Only if cfg is sent send the data
00464 
00465                                                         udetails->UL_data_transmission_off = 0;
00466                                 
00467                                                 } else {
00468 
00469                                                         fprintf(fp_log,"Data cannot be sent as CMD for CFG not received\n");
00470 
00471                                                 }                       
00472         
00473                                         } else if ((c & 0x01) == 0x01){ // Put the data transmission off
00474 
00475                                                 udetails->UL_data_transmission_off = 1;
00476                                         }
00477                         } else { /* If it is a frame other than command frame */
00478                                 
00479                                 fprintf(fp_log,"Not a command frame\n");                                                
00480                         }
00481 
00482                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_Upper_Layer_Details);                                                       
00483                 }                       
00484 
00485         } // while
00486         close(UL_new_fd);
00487         pthread_exit(NULL);
00488 }

00491 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00492 /* FUNCTION  PMU_process_UDP():                                                 */
00493 /* This function processes the frames as per their type( data, config).         */
00494 /* The received frames are from Lower Layer PMU/PDC on UDP.                     */
00495 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00496 
00497 void PMU_process_UDP(unsigned char *udp_buffer,struct sockaddr_in PMU_addr,int sockfd){
00498 
00499         int stat_status;
00500         unsigned int id;
00501         unsigned char id_char[2];
00502 
00503         id_char[0] = udp_buffer[4];
00504         id_char[1] = udp_buffer[5];
00505         id = to_intconvertor(id_char);
00506 
00507         unsigned char c = udp_buffer[1];
00508         c <<= 1;
00509         c >>= 5;
00510         if(c == 0x00){                                                  /* If data frame */
00511 
00512                 stat_status = dataparser(udp_buffer);
00513 
00514                 /* Change in cfg frame is handled */
00515                 if((stat_status == 10)||(stat_status == 14)) {
00516 
00517                         unsigned char *cmdframe = malloc(19);
00518                         cmdframe[18] = '\0';
00519                         create_command_frame(1,id,(char *)cmdframe);
00520 
00521                         if (sendto(sockfd,cmdframe,18, 0,
00522                                                 (struct sockaddr *)&PMU_addr,sizeof(PMU_addr)) == -1)
00523                               perror("sendto");
00524                         free(cmdframe);                                         
00525                         
00526                 } else if (stat_status == 15) {                         /* Data Invalid */
00527 
00528                         fprintf(fp_log,"Data Invalid\n");
00529 
00530                 }
00531 
00532         } else if(c == 0x03) {                                          /* If configuration frame */
00533 
00534                 fprintf(fp_log,"\nConfiguration frame\n");
00535                 cfgparser(udp_buffer);
00536 
00537                 unsigned char *cmdframe = malloc(19);
00538                 cmdframe[18] = '\0';
00539                 create_command_frame(2,id,(char *)cmdframe);
00540                 fprintf(fp_log,"\nReturn from create_command_frame\n");
00541                 /* Command frame sent to send the data frames */
00542                 if (sendto(sockfd,cmdframe, 18, 0,
00543                                                 (struct sockaddr *)&PMU_addr,sizeof(PMU_addr)) == -1)
00544                               perror("sendto");
00545                 free(cmdframe);
00546 
00547         } else {        
00548                 
00549                 fprintf(fp_log,"Erroneous frame\n");
00550 
00551         }       
00552         fflush(stdout);
00553 } 
00554 
00555 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00556 /* FUNCTION  PMU_process_TCP():                                                 */
00557 /* This function processes the frames as per their type( data, config).         */
00558 /* The received frames are from Lower Layer PMU/PDC on TCP.                     */
00559 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00560 
00561 void PMU_process_TCP(unsigned char tcp_buffer[],int sockfd) {
00562 
00563         int stat_status;
00564         unsigned int id;
00565         unsigned char id_char[2];
00566 
00567         id_char[0] = tcp_buffer[4];
00568         id_char[1] = tcp_buffer[5];
00569         id = to_intconvertor(id_char);
00570 
00571         unsigned char c = tcp_buffer[1];
00572         c <<= 1;
00573         c >>= 5;
00574 
00575         if(c == 0x00){                                                  /* If data frame */
00576 
00577                 fprintf(fp_log,"\nData frame\n");
00578                 stat_status = dataparser(tcp_buffer);
00579 
00580                 /* Handle the Stat word */
00581                 if((stat_status == 10)||(stat_status == 14)) {
00582 
00583                         unsigned char *cmdframe = malloc(19);
00584                         cmdframe[18] = '\0';
00585                         create_command_frame(1,id,(char *)cmdframe);
00586 
00587                         if (send(sockfd,cmdframe,18, 0)== -1)
00588                               perror("send");   
00589                         free(cmdframe);                                 
00590 
00591                 } else if (stat_status == 15) {                         /* Data Invalid */
00592 
00593                         fprintf(fp_log,"Data Invalid\n");
00594                 }
00595 
00596         } else if(c == 0x03) {                                          /* If configuration frame */
00597 
00598                 fprintf(fp_log,"\nConfiguration frame\n");
00599                 cfgparser(tcp_buffer);
00600                 unsigned char *cmdframe = malloc(19);
00601                 cmdframe[18] = '\0';
00602                 create_command_frame(2,id,(char *)cmdframe);
00603                 fprintf(fp_log,"\nReturn from create_command_frame\n");
00604                 /* Command frame sent to send the data frames */
00605                 if (send(sockfd,cmdframe,18, 0)== -1)
00606                               perror("send");
00607                 free(cmdframe);
00608  
00609         } else {        
00610                 
00611                 fprintf(fp_log,"\nErroneous frame\n");
00612         }       
00613         fflush(stdout);
00614 }
